Posts.Content: Nov 14, 2008 11:15PM dldclub wrote: I was recently diagnosed and am still trying to make an informed decision.  Thank you everyone for your replies.  I personally am going to have a 2nd excision done before I decide.  My first biopsy was too small to really give me any solid information.  Pathology was not able to get markers, and before I give up my breast, I want more information.    I feel like the approximate month between the lumpectomy, pathology report received, and setting up to start radiation, I will be able to decide if I want a mastectomy before radiation actually begins.   For further reading, I found information on the National Institute of Health (NIH) very helpful and I was finally able to make this decision today.
